author: ebrondol
body:
The main goal of this PR is getting the tracking reconstruction for phase2 working in the release 81X. This has been tested with the upgrade WF (both 2023tilted and 2023GReco) for different samples.
It is just a first preliminary set up in order to introduce the OT clusters and recHits, so further improvements and factorization are expected when also the new phase2 pixel cluster recHits will be introduced ( @atricomi @emiglior ).
Tests have been also run for the run2 WF standard list. No changes is expected.

Still to do:
- setting up validation tools (short term)
- importing phase2 CPE from external package (short term)
- phase2 pixel clusters and recHits
- using stacks in the tracking reconstruction

@VinInn @rovere @boudoul @delaere
title: Phase2 tracking reconstruction in 81X
